entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:34 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:34 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:34 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
